oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Stringfield Memoirs of the Civil War
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: William Williams Stringfield
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Memoirs of the Civil War by William Williams Stringfield. A Typewritten copy. Knoxville, Tenn. 1938. This copy was typed from clippings loaned by the author's daughter, Miss Margaret Stringfield, of Waynesville, N.C. Typing errors in the typescript were not corrected.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Memoirs; Civil wars;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Cataloged books in the McClung Historical Collection
